<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the first time we visit this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Its children have not been added to the stack yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We add current node back, and add its children to the stack.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the second time we visit this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All of its children have already been processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, we can set its LeftLeafIdx and RightLeafIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;FirstChild, LastChild&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the first child to use its RightLeafIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first child is the first one added to the stack, so it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the last one to be processed. Hence, the leaf descendants</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There&#39;s a match with FirstChar, so look for the point in the tree to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If yes, then consume the characters we&#39;ve seen and move to the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SuffixTreeInternalNode&gt;</a>(NextNode) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Active.Node = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SuffixTreeInternalNode&gt;</a>(NextNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, the suffix we&#39;re trying to insert must be contained in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next node we want to move to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastChar = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aa49bfcd763abc20e39f1f6ea9bffc0fb">Str</a>&#91;EndIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is the string we&#39;re trying to insert a substring of the next node?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aa49bfcd763abc20e39f1f6ea9bffc0fb">Str</a>&#91;NextNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9275db494732cf0988a1547c93420de2">getStartIdx</a>() + Active.Len&#93; == LastChar) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If yes, then we&#39;re done for this step. Remember our insertion point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and move to the next end index. At this point, we have an implicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suffix tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NeedsLink &amp;&amp; !Active.Node-&gt;isRoot()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NeedsLink-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#ae53280c72c15c2777d813369d19d4868">setLink</a>(Active.Node);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NeedsLink = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Active.Len++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The string we&#39;re trying to insert isn&#39;t a substring of the next node,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but matches up to a point. Split the node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, say we ended our search at a node n and we&#39;re trying to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert ABD. Then we&#39;ll create a new node s for AB, reduce n to just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representing C, and insert a new leaf node l to represent d. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allows us to ensure that if n was a leaf, it remains a leaf.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   | ABC  ---split---&gt;  | AB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   n                    s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     C / \\ D</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      n   l</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The node s from the diagram</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SuffixTreeInternalNode &#42;SplitNode = insertInternalNode(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Active.Node, NextNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9275db494732cf0988a1547c93420de2">getStartIdx</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NextNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9275db494732cf0988a1547c93420de2">getStartIdx</a>() + Active.Len - 1, FirstChar);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the new node representing the new substring into the tree as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a child of the split node. This is the node l from the diagram.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insertLeaf(&#42;SplitNode, EndIdx, LastChar);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make the old node a child of the split node and update its start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index. This is the node n from the diagram.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NextNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a0d2939d64e268faf36ff88c09d1a59ec">incrementStartIdx</a>(Active.Len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a244b1a8b6c26960faf2663376005ca7a">Children</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aa49bfcd763abc20e39f1f6ea9bffc0fb">Str</a>&#91;NextNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9275db494732cf0988a1547c93420de2">getStartIdx</a>()&#93;&#93; = NextNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SplitNode is an internal node, update the suffix link.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NeedsLink)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NeedsLink-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#ae53280c72c15c2777d813369d19d4868">setLink</a>(SplitNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NeedsLink = SplitNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ve added something new to the tree, so there&#39;s one less suffix to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SuffixesToAdd--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Active.Node-&gt;isRoot()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Active.Len &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Active.Len--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Active.Idx = EndIdx - SuffixesToAdd + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start the next phase at the next smallest suffix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Active.Node = Active.Node-&gt;getLink();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuffixesToAdd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuffixTree::RepeatedSubstringIterator::advance() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear the current state. If we&#39;re at the end of the range, then this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the state we want to be in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RS = RepeatedSubstring();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  N = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each leaf node represents a repeat of a string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;unsigned&gt; RepeatedSubstringStarts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue visiting nodes until we find one which repeats more than once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InternalNodesToVisit.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RepeatedSubstringStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Curr = InternalNodesToVisit.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InternalNodesToVisit.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the length of the string associated with the node. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s too short, we&#39;ll quit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> = Curr-&gt;getConcatLen();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over each child, saving internal nodes for visiting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Internal nodes represent individual strings, which may repeat.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ChildPair : Curr-&gt;Children)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save all of this node&#39;s children for processing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InternalChild =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SuffixTreeInternalNode&gt;</a>(ChildPair.second))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InternalNodesToVisit.push&#95;back(InternalChild);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If length of repeated substring is below threshold, then skip it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> &lt; MinLength)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The root never represents a repeated substring. If we&#39;re looking at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that, then skip it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Curr-&gt;isRoot())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect leaf children or leaf descendants by OutlinerLeafDescendants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OutlinerLeafDescendants) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Curr-&gt;getLeftLeafIdx(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I &lt;= Curr-&gt;</a>getRightLeafIdx();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RepeatedSubstringStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(LeafNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;-&gt;getSuffixIdx());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ChildPair : Curr-&gt;Children)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Leaf = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SuffixTreeLeafNode&gt;</a>(ChildPair.second))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RepeatedSubstringStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Leaf-&gt;getSuffixIdx());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do we have any repeated substrings?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RepeatedSubstringStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &lt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Yes. Update the state to reflect this, and then bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    N = Curr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RS.Length = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx : RepeatedSubstringStarts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RS.StartIndices.push&#95;back(StartIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, either NewRS is an empty RepeatedSubstring, or it was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set in the above loop. Similarly, N is either nullptr, or the node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// associated with NewRS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
